name: Rat Date
description:
You're a rat. You have a ratfriend. You prepare a date for the two of you. Simple as that!
--------------------------------
Use the arrow or WASD keys to move and start the game!
For mobile controls: use the touch screen and swipe in the direction you want to go!
-------------------------------

Hi! This is my first ever finished project in bitsy! I made it for fun as a gift for my boyfriend but I decided to share it with more people as well :)

Massive thanks to:
- Adam Le Doux for creating Bitsy!
- ruin for making pixsy!
- candle for bitsy audio!
- ChillMindscapes for the "I Think I Like You" track used in this game!
- My boyfriend for giving me an idea for RAT DATE!

And YOU for playing! ❤️
